name: The Waking Dead: Contamination of the Zombie Plague Apocalypse
name_original: The Waking Dead: Contamination of the Zombie Plague Apocalypse
description:
*** The Zombies Have Awoken And The Apocalypse Seems Inevitable ***

As Zombies have awoken and are hoarding up, you take the role of a Zombie Apocalypse survivor. Shoot as many Zombies you can in 60 seconds to set an example of how to survive in this world!

With our Real-Time Multiplayer, you can compete against any other Zombie Apocalypse survivor you wish! Either start a random match, or invite your friends on Facebook to join in.

!!! Download This Game Now While It's FREE !!!
